header.listHead: This chat application respects your privacy. Here's what you need to know:

body.1: Only your chosen username and messages posted in the General Chat are stored temporarily.
body.2: No emails, passwords, or personal identifying information are collected.

content.title: Why We Collect It
content.body: These details are necessary for the basic functionality of the application â€” to display usernames and chat messages.

body.1: Messages and usernames may be stored in local storage or in the temporary backend database as part of the development environment.
body.2: These are not shared or used for analytics, advertising, or any commercial purpose.

content.title: Data Security
content.body: While efforts are made to protect the stored data, this is a learning project and may not implement production-grade security.

content.title: Third-Party Sharing
content.body: No information is shared with any third parties. This application is entirely self-contained for learning purposes

content.title: User Rights
content.body: As this is a test project, users may clear their data by clearing browser storage or contacting the developer for manual removal.

footer.title: Contact
footer.body: If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to the developer Mayank Pun(gc_mayankpun) through the project repository or personal contact (if provided).
